Text: The Grass Fight was a small battle during the Texas Revolution, fought between the Mexican Army and the Texian Army.

<Text: Grass Fight:  The Texas Revolution had officially begun on October 2 and by the end of the month the Texian had initiated a siege of Béxar, home of the largest Mexican garrison in the province.>
